relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare extends inline security controls to deliver simple, preventative cloud security. Announcement >

leftHalf.title: Simplify SSE & SASE adoption
leftHalf.copy:
__Modernize your network and protect your workforce with our unified cloud-native platform__
Too many SSE and SASE journeys are held back by disjointed 'platforms' saddled with tech debt. Cloudflare's connectivity cloud is the modern answer — a composable, cloud-native platform that adapts to any use case.

marketoForm.bladeName: Zero Trust Ent Plan - Contact us
marketoForm.marketoFormLeadSourceDetail: [ACQ] Q3'20 WEB - Zero Trust Contact Us - Ent Plan

buttonModal.title: Request a Zero Trust discussion
buttonModal.regularCopy: Fill out the form below, and an expert from our team will get in touch to schedule a customized discussion of your Zero Trust journey and how Cloudflare may be able to help.

relatedBlades.title: Improve IT efficiency and user experience while reducing cyber risk

columnContent.title: Efficient network improvements
columnContent.description: Fast-track your SSE or SASE journey. Cloudflare connects and secures end-to-end using one network and control plane with security built-in — and improves IT team efficiency by 13%.

columnContent.title: Reliable user experiences
columnContent.description: Ensure reliable and scalable network connectivity with consistent protection from any location. Deliver Zero Trust for your business using the same Cloudflare proxies that protect ~20% of the web.

columnContent.title: Reduced risk and cyber costs
columnContent.description: Prevent gaps and alert fatigue with integrated services that draw on the same peerless threat intelligence — drawn from blocking %{ThreatsBlockedPerDay} billion daily threats. Cloudflare improves security team efficiency by 29%.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named in 2024 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Single-Vendor SASE
columnContent.description: We believe this recognition is a testament to Cloudflare's "light branch, heavy cloud" architecture and its ability to help global, cloud-minded enterprises accelerate their network modernization.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave™: Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
columnContent.description: Cloudflare received the highest score in the global network criterion. We believe this recognition validates our commitment to build SASE "the right way," converging network and security services on a composable, programmable connectivity cloud.

columnContent.title: Cloudflare named a 'Leader' in 2024 IDC MarketScape for Worldwide Commercial Edge Delivery Services
columnContent.description: IDC highlights Cloudflare for having a "keen focus on the developer ecosystem and a strategy to invest in new technologies". This recognition validates our approach to help businesses of any size with any-to-any connectivity to apps, users and networks in a simple and secure way.

imageAssetFile.altText: Analyst Recognition - IDC - Full Color Thumbnail

contentfulAsset.description: Analyst Recognition - IDC - Full Color Thumbnail

relatedBlades.heading: How Cloudflare delivers SSE and SASE

content.value: Cloudflare's
connectivity cloud
delivers SSE services from a %{DataCenterCount}-city network that's close to users everywhere, letting you:
Verify more types of identify context and more easily adapt policies
Block more threats using our peerless threat intelligence
Improve visibility into sensitive data, security compliance, and user experiences
Expand your deployment with our flexible architecture and single-pass inspection
Learn more in our SASE reference architecture
Cloudflare's connectivity cloud helps you supplement or replace MPLS and VPNs through:
Internet-native connectivity
Built-in security that enforces stateful inspection rules and sends all traffic to our SSE and DDoS services
Performance enhancements, thanks to our built-in smart routing, load balancing, and more
Learn more in our SASE reference architecture
Cloudflare's connectivity cloud adapts to any unique need via:
Programmability:
Customize routing, policies, and more with lightweight serverless code
Performance:
Every Cloudflare service sits within %{OperationMilliseconds}ms of %{GlobalInternetConnectedPercent}% of global Internet users
Integration:
We directly interconnect with over %{NetworkInterconnects} clouds, apps, networks, and ISPs
Reliability:
We proxy ~20% of the web and can route your requests along the fastest paths
Learn more in our SASE reference architecture
Cloudflare's connectivity cloud easily connects to all types of infrastructure, thanks to:
Clientless access (i.e. requiring no end-user software)
An optional all-in-one client for your managed devices
Our "zero-touch provisioning" branch connector
Our Anycast GRE/IPsec tunnels, for existing SD-WANs
Direct connections (physical or virtual) in more than 1600 colocation facilities
Learn more in our SASE reference architecture

relatedBlades.title: Learn More
relatedBlades.description: The Buyer's Guide to SASE Use Cases

cards.title: Adopt Zero Trust
cards.description: Augment or replace risky VPNs, secure contractor or unmanaged device access, mitigate ransomware attacks, view and reduce data exposure

cards.title: Modernize your network
cards.description: Simplify branch connectivity and transition from MPLS, reduce or eliminate DMZ, eliminate elevated trust on the LAN, accelerate M&A connectivity

cards.title: Protect your attack surface
cards.description: Prevent multi-channel phishing and business email compromise, protect remote workers, protect distributed offices, secure the WAN

cards.title: Modernize your apps
cards.description: Secure app access and cloud migrations, protect privileged access, prevent leaks of developer code, secure DevOps workflows

cards.title: Protect your data anywhere
cards.description: Simplify compliance with data privacy regulations, manage shadow IT, safely use generative AI, protect your sensitive data

cards.title: Consolidate point products
cards.description: Retire dated hardware and converge point solutions. No more legacy VPN, SWG, SEG, CASB, DLP, FW, SD-WAN, or MPLS

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Cloudflare helps Conrad Electronic deliver
Zero Trust and cut networking costs

content.value: Conrad Electronic was too reliant on risky VPN connectivity and labor-intensive security services. In response, they adopted Cloudflare's Zero Trust security services and used it plus Terraform to automate security workflows.
Now, they've dumped 1000 expensive VPN licenses and are responding to threats much faster than before.

"Everything is easier with [Cloudflare]. All internal and external resources that have an account with our identity provider can quickly connect to specific systems using a single sign-on. Not having to maintain 1,000 VPN profiles improves our security and saves us time and money."

features.title: Bouvet
features.description: Bouvet uses Cloudflare to protect their online infrastructure and give employees secure work-from-home access to company resources

features.title: Temple & Webster
features.description: Temple & Webster has deployed Cloudflare to replace legacy performance and security solutions, secure employee access and accelerate regulatory compliance

features.title: Sage
features.description: Sage leverages Cloudflare to improve application performance and security, enhance product development, secure user data, and streamline their digital footprint

features.title: Caliente
features.description: Caliente.mx, Mexico online gaming and live sports betting platform, consolidated applications,  enhanced security, improved performance and scalability, and streamlined user experience with Cloudflare

features.title: Applied Systems
features.description: Applied Systems unifies security and networking with Cloudflare, reducing risk, improving productivity for employees, and delivering superior cloud-native experiences for customers

features.title: Envato
features.description: Envato uses Cloudflare Zero Trust and Application Security to eliminate downtime and secure employee access to company tools

columnContent.title: Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA)
columnContent.description: Enforce default-deny, Zero Trust rules for users accessing.

columnContent.title: Secure Web Gateway (SWG)
columnContent.description: Secure and inspect corporate Internet traffic to mitigate risk.

columnContent.title: Remote Browser Isolation (RBI)
columnContent.description: Protect against Internet and data threats — no performance drop.
